mapper.select: SELECT u2.*,a.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u2,(SELECT u.USER_NO, NVL(AVG(e.EVAL_SCORE),0) USER_SCORE FROM USERS u,EVAL e WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT re_user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND USER_NO = #{user_no} UNION SELECT user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND RE_USER_NO = #{user_no}) AND u.USER_NO = e.PUSER(+) GROUP BY u.USER_NO) a WHERE u2.USER_NO = a.USER_NO

SELECT u2.*,a.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u2,(SELECT u.USER_NO, NVL(AVG(e.EVAL_SCORE),0) USER_SCORE FROM USERS u,EVAL e WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT re_user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND USER_NO = #{user_no} UNION SELECT user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND RE_USER_NO = #{user_no}) AND u.USER_NO = e.PUSER(+) GROUP BY u.USER_NO) a WHERE u2.USER_NO = a.USER_NO AND u2.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{user_name} || '%'
SELECT * FROM USERS u WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT USER_NO FROM USER_TASK_MANY WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{project_no} AND TASK_NO = #{task_no}) ORDER BY USER_NAME
